snp1.8:4.3: mahantā → ye mahantā vā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); mahanta (?)
snp1.8:1.4: va → ye ca (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1)
snp1.8:5.3: Bhūtā va sambhavesī va → bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
snp1.8:6.2: na kañci → naṁ kañci (bj, pts-vp-pli1); naṁ kiñci (sya-all); na kiñci (mr)
